Ok so here we go these boots look super cute and the price isn’t bad either but the fall victim to poor design. The shoe has laces and a side zipper here is the mistake. Zippers are supposed to make it easy to put on boots but the zipper fails here because it’s got these buckles that wrap around the boot shaft where the zipper is.  So in order to put these on you have to undo the buckles that are wrapped around the shaft of the boot then unzip it, put foot in, zip up and then re up re-wrap the buckle and fasten them in place. It may not be a big deal to some folks but to me it’s for design having to fasten buckles is the same thing as having to tie a lace the zipper supposed to be there for convenience and let’s face it ladies if you were in these boots and you’re going out for the evening when you get home the last thing you wanna do is be fiddling with buckles. Oh and the boot heel is slippery on wood floors so that could also be problematic.  So final report card for these boots • Style 5⭐️ stars they are really cute boots • Comfort 4⭐️ stars there are comfortable but the heel can slide so be warned. • Fit 5⭐️ stars they run absolutely true to size. • Design 2⭐️ stars they may be cute but those buckles really killed it for me. • Constuction 4 ⭐️ stars they had some marks like where the pieces were cut off a pattern and had the white chalk like marks on them the came off with a damp cloth but when dry I could still see the faint lines.
